author: Special Correspondent
text: A holiday has been declared for State government offices and educational institutions of Virudhunagar district on January 20 when the mahasamprokshanam of Andal Temple at Srivilliputtur is to take place. February 13 will be the substitute working day. As the holiday has not been declared under the Negotiable Instruments Act, essential services like the District Treasury will function with the required staff.
title: Local holiday
